body:
Hey all.

Love Ruqqus. Happy to be here!

I was able to set an image now that I have 300 rep (for profile photo, that is). I noticed it doesn't cleanly crop (and I am assuming it automatically crops the center, which may or may not be what users expect)...even with circular photos or transparent backgrounds.

Perhaps we could have a thing where you upload a photo and select the area you want to crop to use? Also, not sure about the white jagged dots/lines that happen now, but depending on how it works it could be a CSS thing, or something in the code if it actually does a crop in the back-end.

Anyhow, just a thought or two, nothing that is a deal-breaker. I love this platform already and will be donating monthly to see it's continued success.

eat some broccoli. 

EDIT: If you add a white border around your photo, it blends the white noise and looks perfect.

EDIT 2: Looks like the site automatically scales the photo to a resolution and uses that. That could be causing the white "noise" (i swear this isn't a BLM post).

Perhaps we could have a thing where you upload a photo and select the area you want to crop to use? Also, not sure about the white jagged dots/lines that happen now, but depending on how it works it could be a CSS thing, or something in the code if it actually does a crop in the back-end.

Anyhow, just a thought or two, nothing that is a deal-breaker. I love this platform already and will be donating monthly to see it's continued success.

title: Idea for profile photos regarding cropping

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: It would be a cool feature and could definitely be implemented in the future, but it's a low priority. Ruqqus is still a very young site and the admins have much bigger issues to focus on.
body_html: It would be a cool feature and could definitely be implemented in the future, but it's a low priority. Ruqqus is still a very young site and the admins have much bigger issues to focus on.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs
